snippet: Peyron won the Route du Rhum trans-Atlantic race in record time, completing the 3,500-nautical-mile course 7 days 15 hours 8 minutes 32 seconds.
abstract: French sailor Loick Peyron wins the Route du Rhum trans-Atlantic race in record time, 7 days 15 hours 8 minutes.
lead_paragraph: Peyron won the Route du Rhum trans-Atlantic race in record time, completing the 3,500-nautical-mile course 7 days 15 hours 8 minutes 32 seconds.

headline.main: French Sailor Loick Peyron Sets Record
